  • 方法详细资料

    • writeJson

      public static boolean writeJson(String jsonFilePath, Object obj)
      Convert object to JSON string
      参数:
      jsonFilePath - the path of the json file
      obj - the object to be converted
      返回:
      If convert is successful, return true, otherwise return false

    • extractJsonData

      public static String extractJsonData(String jsonFilePath)
      Read JSON file and convert to String
      参数:
      jsonFilePath - the path of the json file
      返回:
      If read is successful, return the String, otherwise return null
